title: Text Schema
description: A JSON Schema for the Text credential that represents textual content using schema.org vocabulary.

id.description: The unique identifier for the text content, typically a URI.

schema:name.description: The name or title of the text content.

schema:description.description: A description of the text content.

schema:url.description: The URL where the text content can be accessed.

oneOf.description: The URI of the author of the text content.

schema:author.description: The author of the text content.

oneOf.description: The URI of the creator of the text content.

schema:creator.description: The creator of the text content.

schema:dateCreated.description: The date and time when the text content was created.

schema:datePublished.description: The date and time when the text content was published.

schema:dateModified.description: The date and time when the text content was last modified.

schema:genre.description: The genre of the text content.

schema:keywords.description: Keywords or tags associated with the text content.

schema:license.description: The license under which the text content is distributed.

oneOf.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

id.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

schema:name.description: The name of the copyright holder.

schema:copyrightHolder.description: The copyright holder of the text content.

schema:inLanguage.description: The language of the text content (ISO 639-1 code).

schema:isAccessibleForFree.description: Whether the text content is accessible for free.

schema:thumbnailUrl.description: The URL of a thumbnail image for the text content.

schema:image.description: The URL of an image representing the text content.

schema:abstract.description: An abstract or summary of the text content.

schema:interactionType.description: The type of interaction being measured.

schema:interactionStatistic.description: Statistics about user interactions with the text content.

schema:isPartOf.description: The URI of a larger creative work of which this text is a part.

schema:hasPart.description: Array of URIs of text segments that are parts of this text.

schema:citation.description: Citations or references used in the text content.

schema:wordCount.description: The number of words in the text content.

schema:characterCount.description: The number of characters in the text content.

schema:pageCount.description: The number of pages in the text content.

schema:duration.description: The duration of the text content (for time-based media).

schema:textFormat.description: The format of the text content (e.g., plain text, HTML, Markdown).

schema:encodingFormat.description: The encoding format of the text content.

schema:fileFormat.description: The file format of the text content.

schema:contentSize.description: The size of the text content.

schema:isFamilyFriendly.description: Whether the text content is family friendly.

schema:dateLastReviewed.description: The date and time when the text content was last reviewed.

schema:mainContentOfPage.description: The main content of the text.

schema:significantLinks.description: The most significant URLs in the text content.

schema:accessMode.description: The human sensory perceptual system or cognitive faculty through which a person may process or perceive information.

schema:accessibilityAPI.description: Indicates that the resource is compatible with the referenced accessibility API.

schema:accessibilityControl.description: Identifies input methods that are sufficient to fully control the described resource.

schema:accessibilityFeature.description: Content features of the resource, such as accessible media, alternatives and supported enhancements for accessibility.

schema:accessibilityHazard.description: A characteristic of the described resource that is physiologically dangerous to some users.

schema:accessibilitySummary.description: A human-readable summary of specific accessibility features or deficiencies, consistent with the other accessibility metadata.
